file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-81-02-04 - TUNING BACKUP UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TUNING BACKUP UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the tuning backup unit. B. The tuning backup unit is installed on the control-pedestal forward panel. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 23-81-02-000-801-A TUNING BACKUP UNIT - REMOVAL ALL 23-81-02-400-801-A TUNING BACKUP UNIT - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-81-02 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-81-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TUNING BACKUP UNIT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the tuning backup unit. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223/224 Cockpit C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the CDH circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/CDH). I. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Turn the Allen screws (3) until the tuning backup unit (2) is unlocked and released. (2) Carefully pull the tuning backup unit (2) from its housing to get access to the electrical connector (1). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (1) from the tuning backup unit (2). (4) Install protection caps on the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-81-02 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH A CHANNEL SPACING OF 25kHz Tuning Backup Unit - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 223 224 DET. A 3. ALLEN SCREWS 2. TUNING BACKUP UNIT 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM230121.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-81-02 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH CHANNEL SPACING OF 8.33kHz Tuning Backup Unit - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B A ZONE 223 224 DET. A 3. ALLEN SCREWS 2. TUNING BACKUP UNIT 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM230188.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-81-02 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-81-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. TUNING BACKUP UNIT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the tuning backup unit. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION RADIO MANAGEMENT SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL AMM TASK 23-81-00-700-801-A/500 TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223/224 Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove the protection cap from the electrical connector (1). (2) Hold the tuning backup unit (2) and connect the electrical connector (1). (3) Carefully install the tuning backup unit (2) in its installation position. (4) Tighten the Allen screws (3) until the tuning backup unit (2) is locked and attached. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the CDH circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/CDH). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-81-02 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Do the test of the tuning backup unit ( AMM TASK 23-81-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-81-02 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
